department.ch: 能源工程研究所碩士班

goal.ch: The goal of this course is to enhance the student‘s ability to utilize the knowledge learned in basic thermodynamics to analyze the practical problem.
goal.en: The goal of this course is to enhance the student‘s ability to utilize the knowledge learned in basic thermodynamics to analyze the practical problem.

outline.ch:
A comprehensive introduction to the fundamental principles of thermodynamics will be introduced in the first few weeks.
The rest of the course will cover more advanced topics and concepts within the field of thermodynamics. The advanced cycles, non-ideal gases, statistical thermodynamics, and more specialized applications will be introduced.
